home.title: Create and Share Static Content
home.subtitle: Transform HTML, Markdown, CSV, Excel files, images, PDFs, and QR codes into permanent links that render instantly in the browser
home.whatIsDescription: A static, client-only app that turns your content into shareable links. It compresses and encodes data inside the URL (or hash for images/PDFs), so there is no server storage or database. You can preview, recover, render securely, apply themes, generate QR codes, and share images and PDFs from a single page.
home.howWorksDescription: Choose a content type, paste or upload your file, and generate a link. HTML is rendered in sandboxed iframes, Markdown is converted and themed, CSV/XLSX becomes interactive tables, and images/PDFs use hash-based links. You can open in a new tab, use full-screen render-all, or download the original file any time.
home.htmlDesc: Securely render full web pages in sandboxed iframes with clickable links and optional full-screen view
home.markdownDesc: Convert Markdown to styled HTML with theme-aware colors and readable typography
home.csvDesc: Turn CSV/XLSX files into responsive tables with headers and scrollable layouts
home.imageDesc: Upload an image, generate a hash-based link, and render it with instant preview
home.pdfDesc: Upload a PDF, generate a hash-based link, and render multi-page documents
home.qrDescription: Create QR codes for any text or link, then export or share them in multiple formats
home.qrHowWorksDescription: Paste a text or URL, generate the QR code, adjust size, margin, and error correction, then export PNG/SVG, copy the image, or open in a new tab/popup.
home.qrFeatureGenerate: Generate QR codes from text or links
home.qrFeatureCustomize: Adjust size, margin, and error correction level
home.qrFeatureExport: Export as PNG/SVG, copy image, open in new tab or popup
home.qrFeatureRenderLink: Generate render and render-all links to share the QR code
home.limitsDescription: To keep links short and fast to load, consider the following sizes:
home.limitsNote: Larger files work, but may generate longer URLs and impact loading time.
home.sharing: Sharing formatted documents, tables, images, and PDFs

create.title: Create New Link
create.urlTooLong: Content is too large to generate a safe link (limit exceeded). Try reducing the size.
create.pasteHash: Paste the full link code here (e.g., md-H4s...)
create.qrInputLabel: Text or link for the QR code
create.qrInputPlaceholder: Paste text or a link here
create.qrHint: Your QR code will appear here
create.imageDescription: Upload an image and generate a link that renders it on /render/image.
create.imagePreviewHint: Your image preview will appear here
create.imageInvalid: Please upload a valid image file
create.pdfDescription: Upload a PDF and generate a link that renders it with multiple pages.
create.pdfPreviewHint: Your PDF preview will appear here
create.pdfInvalid: Please upload a valid PDF file

render.title: View Content
render.notFoundDescription: The provided hash does not match any stored content.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

renderError.title: Error Processing File
renderError.description: The file content appears to be corrupted or in an invalid format.
renderError.hint: Usually this happens when the wrong file type was selected during creation.
